post.description: With this endpoint products can be tracked that visitors have viewed on your storefront.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor viewing a product.

ProductKey.description: The article number of the product that has been viewed.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who viewed the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor viewing a product.

ProductKey.description: The article number of the product that has been viewed.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who viewed the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor viewing a product.

ProductKey.description: The article number of the product that has been viewed.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who viewed the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor viewing a product.

ProductKey.description: The article number of the product that has been viewed.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who viewed the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor viewing a product.

ProductKey.description: The article number of the product that has been viewed.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who viewed the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

400.description: The page view could not be tracked because the request was invalid.

401.description: The instance key is missing from the headers (key: Instance-Key).

post.description: With this endpoint purchases can be tracked that customers have made on your storefront.

schema.description: Represents the action of a customer purchasing products.

ProductKeys.description: The article numbers of the products the customer purchased.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who purchased the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a customer purchasing products.

ProductKeys.description: The article numbers of the products the customer purchased.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who purchased the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a customer purchasing products.

ProductKeys.description: The article numbers of the products the customer purchased.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who purchased the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a customer purchasing products.

ProductKeys.description: The article numbers of the products the customer purchased.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who purchased the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a customer purchasing products.

ProductKeys.description: The article numbers of the products the customer purchased.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key identifying the visitor who purchased the product. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

400.description: The purchase could not be tracked because the request was invalid.

401.description: The instance key is missing from the headers (key: Instance-Key).

post.description: With this endpoint search terms can be tracked that visitors have used on your storefront.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor searching through products.

SearchTerm.description: The search term the visitor used to search for products.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key that relates to the visitor who executed a search action. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.

schema.description: Represents the action of a visitor searching through products.

ProfileKey.description: The profile key that relates to the visitor who executed a search action. Must not include personally identifiable information (PII) to comply with GDPR guidelines.
